text: Phwk cea xya thahı kar rxng reiyk khx ngxal rx sul nı hmu phwk cea pen chen deiyw kab kar rxng reiyk nı rahwang phwk cea dwy kanxeng nænxn xallxh thrng ru brrda phu thi xæb hlik xxk pi nı hmu phwk cea dangnan brrda phu thi fafun kha sang khxng khea (muhammad) cng rawang taw theid wa kheraah krrm ca keid khun kæ phwk khea hrux wakar lngthosʹ xan cebpwd ca keid khun kæ phwk khea chen kan
